mapper.sql: school_id, school_name, school_database_id, school_db_name, entity_type, expire_date, province_id, city_id, area_id, school_place, school_type, school_logo, school_homepage, contact_person, contact_phone, user_uid, wx_mp_uid, ex_info_01, ex_info_02, ex_info_03, ex_info_04, create_time, creator, modify_time, modifier, remarks
mapper.select:
select
,
from sbr_school_info where 1=1
and school_name like concat('%',#{schoolName},'%')
order by create_time desc
